item.title: do you write tests?
item.description: My conversations among peers in the engineering field rarely touch upon testing. It’s not all that surprising because who would want to talk about a boring topic or a practice that is does not exist at their workplace? I like to broach the topic of testing because it gives me a glimpse into how different engineering teams perceive testingand how much they value their engineering craft. Some engineers test their code, even if they do not explicitly write tests.
